text:
Lance Sydney George Finch, (16 June 1938 – 31 August 2020) was a Canadian lawyer and politician. He was the Chief Justice of the British Columbia Court of Appeal from June 6, 2011 until his retirement on June 16, 2013. Finch was born in Edmonton, Alberta.
Finch died on 31 August 2020 in Vancouver, British Columbia at the age of 82.

annotations.surface_form: Chief Justice of the British Columbia Court of Appeal
